verbose_text: Thirdly, phytanic acid and its metabolites have been reported to activate retinoid X receptor (RXR) XREF_BIBR and PPARalpha XREF_BIBR, promoting peroxisomal and mitochondrial fatty acid oxidation XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR.
